::Perndabot::

Perndabot shruggs. "Talk to Zardus, I guess. He's the commander. Here,
follow me."

He walks off toward the Iron Fist, motioning for Antagony to follow.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jen D." <jeniff@h...> wrote:
> Antagony flew through behind Perndabot and landed near him and
looked 
> around. She saw that the base was very impressive, but the life on
this 
> island could use some more color.
> 
> "Very nice" was her responce to Perndbot when he introduced the
base, then 
> she said: "How do I go about joining this 'Alliance'?"
> 
> So far this planet was fairly intersting, but she would see later
on. She 
> already knew that troops would be coming back from a battle soon;
her little 
> sense of the future told her that.
